levelledPara.title: Scope
levelledPara.para: This data module defines standard torque practices for airframe fasteners used on the AMPEL360 PLUS vehicle line.

levelledPara.title: Units, Tolerances, and Notes
levelledPara.para: Torque values shall be specified with units (N·m) and tolerances (±%), along with lubrication condition and temperature range.

levelledPara.title: Reference Tables
levelledPara.para: Use the following tables as general guidance; when a system-specific DM provides a different value, the system-specific value prevails.

levelledPara.title: Cross-References
levelledPara.para: For flight control surfaces, see ATA-27 system-specific torque DMs. For engine mounts, see ATA-71/72/73 as applicable.
